snippet: The owner of a major communications company, Mr. Allbritton also climbed Washington’s social hierarchy, becoming the foremost banker to Embassy Row.
abstract: Joe L Allbritton, financier and media baron who became the foremost banker to Washington's Embassy Row, dies at age 87.
lead_paragraph: The owner of a major communications company, Mr. Allbritton also climbed Washington’s social hierarchy, becoming the foremost banker to Embassy Row.

headline.seo: Joe Allbritton, TV and Banking Titan, Dies at 87
headline.main: Joe Allbritton, TV and Banking Titan, Dies at 87
headline.print_headline: Joe Allbritton, 87, TV and Banking Titan
